organisation_name: The International Center for Law & Economics (ICLE)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
legal_status: Non-profit under the laws of Oregon, USA
goals__remit: ICLE promotes the use of Law & Economics methodologies to inform public policy debates. We believe that intellectually-rigorous, data-driven analysis will lead to efficient policy solutions, consumer satisfaction, and global economic growth.
